statements.query: MATCH (:OCITenancy{ocid: $OCI_TENANCY_ID})-[:OCI_POLICY]->(n:OCIPolicy) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:OCITenancy{ocid: $OCI_TENANCY_ID})-[r:OCI_POLICY]->(:OCIPolicy) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
